rdf:Description.dc:title: Alberta gas plants statistics 1983
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Energy Resources Conservation Board.
Alberta Energy and Utilities Board.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Description based on: 1983; title from text.
Each year issued in several binders.
Issued by: Alberta Energy and Utilities Board, 1995-
Cumulates: Alberta gas plant statistics monthly supplement; Gas processing plants in Alberta quarterly update, and: Approved gas processing plants in Alberta, 1993-
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Natural gas
rdf:Description.dc:relation: Alberta gas plant/gas gathering system statistics - annual statistics
Alberta gas plant statistics monthly supplement
Gas processing plants in Alberta quarterly update
Approved gas processing plants in Alberta quarterly update
